Class Monomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • Monomial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Monomial>
    public class Monomial
extends Object
implements Comparable<Monomial>
    A class that instantiates, compares, and operates upon monomials. It needs to be instantiated with a coefficient and a exponent.
